verses.verse: <S%G5111>Dare<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of you, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4229>matter<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> go to <S%G2919>law<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G94>unjust,<s%> and not <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G40>saints?<s%>

Do you not <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G40>saints<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world?<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> by you, are you <S%G370>unworthy<s%> to <S%G2922>judge<s%> the <S%G1646>smallest<s%> matters?
<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that we shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G32>angels?<s%> <S%G3386>how<s%> <S%G3386>much<s%> <S%G1065>more<s%> things that pertain to this <S%G982>life?<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2922>judgments<s%> of things pertaining to this <S%G982>life,<s%> <S%G2523>set<s%> them to judge who are <S%G1848>least<s%> <S%G1848>esteemed<s%> in the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> to <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1791>shame.<s%> Is it <S%G3779>so,<s%> that there is not a <S%G4680>wise<s%> man <S%G1722>among<s%> you? no, not one that shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1252>judge<s%> <S%G303>between<s%> <S%G3319><s%> his <S%G80>brothers?<s%>
But <S%G80>brother<s%> goes to <S%G2919>law<s%> with <S%G80>brother,<s%> and that <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G571>unbelievers.<s%>

<S%G2236>Now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> there is <S%G3654>utterly<s%> a <S%G2275>fault<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you go to <S%G2917>law<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> with <S%G1438>another.<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> do you not <S%G3123>rather<s%> take <S%G91>wrong?<s%> <S%G1302>why<s%> do you not <S%G3123>rather<s%> suffer yourselves to be <S%G650>defrauded?<s%>
<S%G235>No,<s%> you do <S%G91>wrong,<s%> and <S%G650>defraud,<s%> and that your <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> shall not <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> Be not <S%G4105>deceived:<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4205>fornicators,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3120>effeminate,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G733>abusers<s%> of themselves with <S%G733>mankind,<s%>

<S%G3777>Nor<s%> <S%G2812>thieves,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4123>covetous,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G3183>drunkards,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G3060>revilers,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G727>extortionists,<s%> shall <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G5023>such<s%> were <S%G5100>some<s%> of you: but you are <S%G628>washed,<s%> but you are <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> but you are <S%G1344>justified<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of our <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> things are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to me, but <S%G3956>all<s%> things are not <S%G4851>expedient:<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for me, but I will not be <S%G1850>brought<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G1850>power<s%> of <S%G5100>any.<s%>

<S%G1033>Meats<s%> for the <S%G2836>belly,<s%> and the <S%G2836>belly<s%> for <S%G1033>meats:<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2673>destroy<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> it and them. <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> is not for <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> but for the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> for the <S%G4983>body.<s%>
And <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> up the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1825>raise<s%> up us by his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%>

<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> are the <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> shall I <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G4160>make<s%> them the <S%G3196>members<s%> of an <S%G4204>harlot?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G2228>What?<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> you not that he which is <S%G2853>joined<s%> to an <S%G4204>harlot<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body?<s%> for <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> he, shall be <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
But he that is <S%G2853>joined<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

<S%G5343>Flee<s%> <S%G4202>fornication.<s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G265>sin<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> is <S%G1622>without<s%> the <S%G4983>body;<s%> but he that <S%G4203>commits<s%> <S%G4203>fornication<s%> <S%G264>sins<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G2228>What?<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> you not that <S%G1438>your<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> is the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in you, which you <S%G2192>have<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and you are not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1438>own?<s%>

For you are <S%G59>bought<s%> with a <S%G5092>price:<s%> <S%G1211>therefore<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> and in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> are <S%G2316>God's.<s%>
